channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China Escalates Cyberattacks That Are Increasingly Hard To Detect
item.description: The Trump administration must take decisive action to hold the Chinese government and its affiliated hackers accountable for their cyber activities.

item.title: Restoring Columbus to His Rightful Place
item.description: The White House correctly celebrates the courage, entrepreneurial ambition, religious zeal, and daring that impelled figures like Columbus.

item.title: ‘It is very important to vindicate her’: Mexico’s president want to reclaim the story of Malinche, 16th century translator for the conquistadors
item.description: Mexico kicks off cultural events dedicated to Malinche with her pre-Hispanic name, Malintzin, on the anniversary of Christopher Columbus' arrival.

item.title: GOP lawmaker pushes bill to punish cities that ditched Columbus Day after Trump proclamation
item.description: A new House GOP bill would punish jurisdictions that replaced Columbus Day with Indigenous Peoples Day.

item.title: Hearts Seek More Than Politics
item.description: And the signs are everywhere.

item.title: China calls for Trump to drop 100% tariff threat, urges U.S. to ‘promptly correct its erroneous practices’
item.description: Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokesman Lin Jian said "China will certainly take resolute measures to safeguard its legitimate rights and interests.”

item.title: Trump Is The Best Statesman Of Our Time Because He’s A Realist
item.description: If we are to properly set the conditions for a civilizational rebirth, we must accept that realistic rhetoric is the statecraft needed for renewal.

item.title: California’s Gerrymandering Scam Raises Election Integrity Concerns
item.description: Voters have complained about problems with mail-in ballots ahead of the Golden State's referendum on Proposition 50.

item.title: Dow jumps 413 points in 5 minutes as Trump reassures markets ‘it will all be fine’

item.title: Beware ‘Vlad the Mad’: Cornered Russian Bears Are Extremely Dangerous
